definition: a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife
to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me a cuckold?
sentences.chinese: 你就是讓我戴綠帽子的文員？

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold .
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王本人被描繪成一個被人戴綠帽子的軟弱之人。

sentences.english: Must he be a cuckold for the rest of his life?
sentences.chinese: 他這輩子都得戴綠帽子嗎？

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王本人被描繪成一個被人戴綠帽子的軟弱之人。

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me cuckold ?
sentences.chinese: 你就是那個給我戴綠帽子的助手？

sentences.english: You should keep your wife under control, aren't you afraid of being cuckolded ?
sentences.chinese: 你也不管管你媳婦，就不怕戴綠帽子？

sentences.english: Matt: I don't wanna be a chump .
sentences.chinese: 我不想當戴綠帽子的傻瓜。
